comp303.fivehundred.ai
Interface ICardExchangeStrategy

All Known Subinterfaces:
IRobotPlayer
All Known Implementing Classes:
RandomCardExchangeStrategy, RandomRobot
public interface ICardExchangeStrategy

Defines the behavior of exchanging cards in the hand with cards in the widow.

Method Summary
 CardList selectCardsToDiscard(Bid[] pBids, int pIndex, Hand pHand)
          Select exactly 6 cards from the 16 cards in pHand (basic deal plus widow), to remove from the hand.
 

Method Detail

selectCardsToDiscard

CardList selectCardsToDiscard(Bid[] pBids,
                              int pIndex,
                              Hand pHand)
Select exactly 6 cards from the 16 cards in pHand (basic deal plus widow), to remove from the hand.

Parameters:
pBids - The bids for this round. An array of 4 elements.
pIndex - The index of the player in this round. Between 0 and 3 incl.
pHand - The hand of cards for this player, with the widow added in.
Returns:
Six cards to remove from the hand.
Precondition:
A least one bid in pBids is non-passing., pBids.length == 4, pIndex >= 0 && pIndex <= 3, pHand.size() == 16
